评论详情: i like the fit and the color of the cardigan, however the material doesn’t not feel like cotton. personally the material determines wether or now i’ll wear it. 100% to 70% cotton is normally what i like. this just feels like a mix of polyester and spandex, or some other stretchy material. too much polyester not enough cotton. it’s too stretchy for my liking. feels cheap. will not buy again.

I like the feeling, it doesn't grab or anything, very soft. My only thing is that I expect it to fit loosely, but it is very snug— though you can stretch it pretty easily and have it fit looser. (I typically wear a 2XL if I want a comfortable loose shirt) It still clings around the arms a bit which is not favourable, but I'm sure I can stretch it more.

Just as advertised, oversized cute cardigan with big buttons. I have washed this cardigan 4 times and it still the same as it arrived. My own complaint is that the cardigan did smell horrible when it arrived, had to wash it immediately but it did not get ruined from the washer and the smell went away
Item came in a timely manner my only criticism would be that it does have some loose threads on the shoulder.
My granddaughter loves this sweater. Very soft and she loves the pockets!
Love the softness but it's very small. I'm usually a women's small or medium but the sleeves are very short and small around my torso. Good quality, just size up by two sizes for the over sized look

The sizes run small. My GF is petite and even for her it ran small. Not true to size for the US. If you're a small, get medium and so on.  The quality is really nice. The fabric is soft and warm. My GF gave it the thumbs up.
It was so nice I love it so much but its really oversized but that's ok because I love oversized clothes!
Clothes is thick and warm. Fits exceptionally well.

Ordered a M, I wear a US M and this feels like a US xs. Very nice material, bouncy and extra soft so I was able to stretch it out enough to fit. This will never look like the photo as oversized however if you want a nice granny cardi, I highly recommend this sweater.

评论概述: Nice Sweater buy runs pretty oversized
评论详情: Like shown in the picture these are worn loosly, I belive though many people can order 1 or 2 sizes smaller and still fit.
